items.name: Humans and all animals need oxygen
By absorbing carbon dioxide, trees reduce global warming
Trees cool temperature by providing shade
Trees release water into the air through photosynthesis
Trees absorb tiny particles and smoke
Particulate matters settle on the leaves and when it rains, they are washed down the gutters

dropList.label: Trees provide oxygen and absorb carbon dioxide
dropList.name: oxygen

dropList.label: Trees reduce air pollution. Trees are like giant air purifiers
dropList.name: airPurifier
